title: Candy Boy Ex01 Special
description: Yukino and Kanade Sakurai live together as high school students enjoying their daily life; until one day Sakuya Kamiyama confess her love for Kanade to Yukino, asking for her support. This makes Yukino to release her true feelings for her sister.
genre: [<Genre -> School>, <Genre -> Shounen Ai>, <Genre -> Slice of Life>]
